bibl.title: Receipts, Scribes, and Collectors in Early Ptolemaic Thebes (O. Taxes 2).
bibl.note: O. Chic. Muhs [O. Taxes] II, 1-157 [including bilingual (Demotic and Greek) texts]. - 1. Capitation Taxes before Year 22 of Ptolemy II (1-9). - 2. Capitation Taxes after Year 22 of Ptolemy II (10-76). - 3. Commodity Monopolies (77-93). - 4. Labor and Harvest Taxes (94-109). - 5. Funerary Taxes (110-143). - 6. Other Texts (144-157). - 7. Theban Tax Scribes and Officials. - 8. Taxpayers and Collectors. - Concordance. Indexes.
bibl.seg: MUHS Brian P., Receipts, Scribes, and Collectors in Early Ptolemaic Thebes (O. Taxes 2). (Studia Demotica. 8.)

O. Chic. Muhs [O. Taxes] II, 1-157 [including bilingual (Demotic and Greek) texts]. - 1. Capitation Taxes before Year 22 of Ptolemy II (1-9). - 2. Capitation Taxes after Year 22 of Ptolemy II (10-76). - 3. Commodity Monopolies (77-93). - 4. Labor and Harvest Taxes (94-109). - 5. Funerary Taxes (110-143). - 6. Other Texts (144-157). - 7. Theban Tax Scribes and Officials. - 8. Taxpayers and Collectors. - Concordance. Indexes.
